structure.unit: ARTICLE XIVA. RU-1Z, ZERO LOT LINE DEVELOPMENT SINGLE-FAMILY RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 33-200.1. Uses permitted.
No land, body of water and/or structure shall be used or permitted to be used and no structure shall be hereafter erected, constructed, moved, reconstructed or structurally altered for any purpose in an RU-1Z District which is designed, arranged, or intended to be used or occupied for any purpose other than otherwise specifically provided herein.
Every use permitted in the RU-1, RU-1M(a) and RU-1M(b) Districts.
Detached one-family zero lot line dwellings on individually platted lots, as provided herein. Zero lot line developments shall comply with the following requirements:
That the maximum number of units shall not exceed the number of units as permitted in the Comprehensive Development Master Plan.
Lot sizes shall be in accordance with Article XXXIIIF, Zero Lot Line Development (ZLL).
All development parameters and site plan review criteria in Article XXXIIIF, Zero Lot Line Developments (ZLL) shall be complied with.
